metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7977 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Ghostscript before 9.21 might allow remote attackers to bypass the SAFERmode protection mechanism and consequently read arbitrary files via the useof the .libfile operator in a crafted postscript document.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7977` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 9.18~dfsg~0-0ubuntu2.2
ghostscript-x - 9.18~dfsg~0-0ubuntu2.2
libgs9 - 9.18~dfsg~0-0ubuntu2.2
libgs9-common - 9.18~dfsg~0-0ubuntu2.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.18~dfsg~0-0ubuntu2.2').
